name: Take this St. Elmo's Fire Quiz! Tough Trivia |   Movies

questions.text: When Leslie was moving out of the apartment with Alex, what was the name of the singer that Alec gave Leslie an album for on Valentine's day?
questions.explanation:
Bruce Springsteen.

	"Remember when there used to be Valentines around here."

questions.text: What did Jules always refer to her step-mother as?
questions.explanation:
step-monster.

	Throughout the film Jules step-mother is dying and she is listed as next of kin.  She tries to think of several ways that she can get a cheap funeral for her.  She has ideas of dressing her up as a large cat to using her as fish food.

False.

	Alec was the head of the Young Democrats Society at Georgetown University.  However, he did work for a Republican senator because it paid more money than a Democratic congressman.  It never says in the film that he converted to a Republican.

questions.text: What was the name of the young doctor that Kirby became obsessed with?
questions.explanation:
Dale Biberman.

	Dale Biberman was played by Andie McDowell.  Interesting to note it does sound like Kirby is always saying Dale Beverman.

questions.text: What was the name of the article that Kevin had published in the newspaper after his fling with Leslie?
questions.explanation:
The Meaning of Life.

	Kevin said that being with Leslie allowed him to open up and therefore his work was not overlooked and he became a published writer.

questions.text: What was the name of the daughter of Billy and Felicia?
questions.explanation:
Melody.

	Felicia ended up going back to her old boyfriend because she could not take any more of Billy's failures.

questions.text: St. Elmo's was the name of the bar that the gang hung out at.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Kirby also worked there.  The gang hung out there a lot in college.

questions.text: What were the names of the group of friends that starred in "St. Elmo's Fire?"
questions.correct: Alec, Leslie, Billy, Wendy, Jules, Kirby, Kevin
options: Ross, Monica, Chandler, Joey, Phoebe, Rachel, Marcel
Leslie, Billy, Alec, Kirby, Kevin, Jules,Sunny

questions.explanation:
Alec, Leslie, Billy, Wendy, Jules, Kirby, Kevin.

	Kirby Keger (Emilio Estevez), Billy Hicks (Rob Lowe), Kevin Dolenz (Andrew McCarthy), Jules Jacoby (Demi Moore), Leslie Hunter (Ally Sheedy), and Wendy Beamish (Mare Winningham), Alec Newbary (Judd Nelson).

questions.text: Rob Lowe was nominated for an award for his work as Billy Hicks.
questions.explanation:
True.

	As sad as it is he was nominated for a Razzie Award in 1986 for Worst Supporting Actor.
